title: Input Shaft - Inspection

body.body: Examine all gears, bearings and bushes and thrust washers for damage, distortion, chipped teeth and wear beyond the service limits. Replace all defective components and always use new circlips to assemble the shaft.
Thoroughly clean the bearing housing and inspect for damage, scoring and cracks. Replace the housing if necessary.
